div.p: Five character alphabetic codes fit into current claims processing software or onto standard paper claim forms. ABC Codes give business parity to licensed CAM and nurse providers who file claims to insurance companies. .

description.value: Five character alphabetic codes fit into current claims processing software or onto standard paper claim forms. ABC Codes give business parity to licensed CAM and nurse providers who file claims to insurance companies. .

copyright.value: ASCII flat file = $59.95, coding manaul = $79.95. Break even for development since 1995 if 20% market penetration by 2003.
